title: Love Letter

adjectives: Of or relating to the heart
Feeling or showing love and affection
verbs: To be fond of. Often bracketed or abbreviated with a heart symbol.
To feel an affection, emotion or love for.
To send (a letter, parcel, etc.) through the mail.
nouns: A flat (usually rectangular) container for a letter, thin package, etc.
Electronic mail, most commonly referred to as email or e-mail since, is a method of exchanging digital messages from an author to one or more recipients.
A message sent via an e-mail system.

A string that identifies a user so that the user can receive Internet email. An email address on the Internet typically consists of an account name, followed by the @ (at) symbol, a host name, and a domain name.

Information at the top of an e-mail message, including the name and address of the sender and recipient, the date and time sent, the subject, and other information that is not part of the body text of the message. The mail header is used by an e-mail client or program.
Information or message that is transmitted or exchanged from one computer terminal to another, through telecommunication.
An app for sending and receiving email.
A folder that stores messages that have been created but not yet sent.
Message sent via e-mail.
A message that is sent over a communications network such as a local area network or the Internet.

(computer science) a system of world-wide electronic communication in which a computer user can compose a message at one terminal that can be regenerated at the recipient's terminal when the recipient logs in
A notification issued when a message is received
A utility that allows the user to send and receive e-mail.
The exchange of text messages and computer files over a communications network, such as a local area network or the Internet.
Method of sending digital messages from an author to one or more recipients
A written message addressed to a person or organization
A letter is a written message from one party to another containing information.
A written message.
A form of written communication; see also mail
A written message; a letter, note or memo.
A text that is written to and for a specific person or set of people (and is most commonly sent to them by post).
An activity that tracks the delivery of a letter. The activity can contain the electronic copy of the letter.
Written message containing information from one party to another
A love letter.
Letter about the author's love.
A personal letter to a loved one expressing affection
A love letter
A love letter is a romantic way to express feelings of love in written form.
Letter expressing feelings of love
A letter written about the author's love for the intended reader.
Love is a variety of different feelings, states, and attitudes that ranges from interpersonal affection to pleasure.
An intense feeling of affection and care towards another person.
Emotion based on affection
A strong positive emotion of regard and affection
In the Italian or Latin languages
The form of romantic affection that is considered pure and wholly positive, not just based on feelings of lust.

Love is a word which refers to a variety of different emotional states, feelings or attitudes which range from those of simple personal pleasures or desires to those characterizing interpersonal affection and many forms of profound kindness, compassion, and benevolent concern for the good of others.
?, representing love, the organ, or a card suit
A feeling of love or strong attachment.
Affection is a "disposition or rare state of mind or body" that is often associated with a feeling or type of love.

The heart symbol or "heart shape" is an ideograph used to express the idea of the "heart" in its metaphorical or symbolic sense as the center of emotion, including affection and love, especially romantic love.
Philia, often translated "brotherly love", is one of the four ancient Greek words for love: philia, storge, agape and eros.
A conventional shape or symbol used to represent the heart, love, or emotion: ? or sometimes <3.
Affection, attraction, infatuation, or fondness is a "disposition or rare state of mind or body" that is often associated with a feeling or type of love.
As used by Aristotle in his Nichomachean Ethics
A stylized representation of the muscular organ, used as a symbol for affection, in the shape of two top lobes and a tapering bottom.
A positive feeling of liking
Feeling of love or strong attachment.
An envelope is a common packaging item, usually made of thin flat material.
A structured set of information that wraps and accompanies an instance message, often describing delivery and processing information. Envelopes can be nested.
A paper or cardboard wrapper used to enclose small, flat items, especially letters, for mailing.
Wrapper for mailing.
Packaging item, usually made of thin flat material
The mail or post is a system for physically transporting documents and other small packages, as well as a name for the postcards, letters, and parcels themselves.
The letters, parcels etc delivered to a particular address or person.
Anything sent through postal services

Mail, or post, is a system for transporting letters and other tangible objects: written documents, typically enclosed in envelopes, and also small packages are delivered to destinations around the world.
The system whereby messages are transmitted via the post office
A message or topic published on a blog, message board or Help board.
A single delivery of letters; the letters or deliveries that make up a single batch delivered to one person or one address.
Method of delivering mail.
System for transporting documents and other small packages
A batch of letters and parcels received via post.

description:
The back of an envelope, generally shown in white and sealed with a red heart. Represents a love letter or note, valentine, or affectionate greeting card. Commonly used to convey various feelings or messages of love and happiness.

Facebook’s envelope is pink, while Microsoft’s envelope was previously open.
apple_vendor_description: The love letter emoji on Apple devices is a charmingly folded envelope, sealed with a bright red heart, exuding a feeling of heartfelt sentiment. Its design showcases Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading, making the paper texture subtly visible and the heart emblem pop with a soft glow. On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully symbolizes romance, secret confessions, or the delivery of affectionate messages, adding a touch of tender emotion.
